product_name: SportHill Outdoor Capri Pants - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: From hiking at home to travel abroad, the women's SportHill Outdoor Capri Pants keep you exploring in comfort because they wick moisture, dry fast and offer UPF 50+ sun protection. Lightweight yet tough mini-ripstop polyester/spandex fabric is super stretchy so you move with ease. Durable water repellent finish beads up light rain or paddle splashes so it rolls right off. Capris wick moisture off your skin, dry fast and are rated UPF 50+; roll above the knee for wading. Non-roll elastic waistband has an adjustable drawcord. 2 angled front pockets, 1 back zippered pocket. SportHill Outdoor Capri Pants for women have a 22 in. inseam for good coverage.
short_description: From hiking at home to travel abroad, the women's SportHill Outdoor Capri Pants keep you exploring in comfort because they wick moisture, dry fast and offer UPF 50+ sun protection.
